rows.label: qst201907_msg0001
rows.name: Here, we found it.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0002
rows.name: Wow! It's beautiful... Thank you, miss!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0003
rows.name:
Ohhh... what an innocent
and lovely smile.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0004
rows.name:
My dear, would you be interested
in joining our harem?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0005
rows.name: She really has no boundaries...

rows.label: qst201907_msg0006
rows.name:
Hey, Rinne. Shouldn't we
be looking for the
black-feathered Nopon first?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh, yes, that is right. We
had completely forgotten.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0008
rows.name: Let's ask this girl for more details.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0009
rows.name:
You want to know about
the black Nopon, right?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0010
rows.name:
That is correct. Would you be so
kind as to tell us in detail?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0011
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0012
rows.name:
When I bumped into the black
Nopon, he dropped a memo.
Will this be useful?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0013
rows.name: Ohhh! What a sweet child...

rows.label: qst201907_msg0014
rows.name:
This means we have no choice
but to add her to a special
seat in our harem!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0015
rows.name: Enough of that!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0016
rows.name: More importantly, the memo's contents!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0017
rows.name: ...We know.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0018
rows.name: Ahem! Then we shall read!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0019
rows.name:
"The secret meeting this time will be
held on the deck of the Uzushio. Be
sure not to be late, mo." ...it says.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0020
rows.name:
This is a memo for a secret meeting.
Now we know exactly where he is!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0021
rows.name: Indeed, it seems so.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0022
rows.name:
Just you wait, black-feathered
fool! We will bring down the
hammer of justice upon you!
